trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Mesa
There were no other sightings in Mesa on or around July 16th 2012
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: First object seen was a flash of light then flew but kept its glow
divs: Sighting DetailsFirst object seen was a flash of light, then it started to move but looked like a star, then it flashed again while moving up and disappeared. Second object seen was flashing white randomly while remaining stationary, a second object flashed near but flash was not as bright. Then a glowing white object flew over my house, but was high in the sky. Then we got scared and ran inside.
